discourse_list.title: Brainstorming How to become eligble for AIRDROP #2

content.content: we can talk here about how to qualify for AIRDROP #2 A few requirements!  Keep it tidy Don’t give financial advice to anyone
content.GPT-summary: The post is about discussing the requirements to become eligible for AIRDROP #2 and the author is asking for feedback on how to qualify. The author also mentions some requirements and advises to keep the discussion tidy and not give financial advice.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: 1.OP quest nft miner：4,7,10,14,18NFTs ladder reward. 2.Active user on optimism:Every two weeks have at least 4txs. 3.Active user on Etherum:have at least 50txs on mainet since POS day. 4.Optimism governance participants:delegate OP to delegators or vote at least 5 proposals. 5.Optimism 2022 phoenix NFT miner. 6.Gitcoin donor From June 1,2022 to February 1,2023.
how do you know??  Did you refer to the previous one?
